name: Dicey's Despair
description:
[Playing in full-screen and with headphones is recommended]

This game and all of its assets were made in 50 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 :^)

Dicey was just like any dice; until, a face was drawn on by a kid. Soon he was being rolled across the table and off the edge he went. He fell and fell towards the floor and bounced under the bed. There he became a little more and sprouted little limbs. He stood and looked out into the dark and found it looking at him.

Controls: 

Look with mouse

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

Space to roll

Made by:

  • Yernemm - Programming and putting stuff together in Unity
  • mMonolith - Making really cool sound effects (those dice rolls be sounding nice), also some level design and 3D props
  • Syntyriel - Making the models for the spooky enemies and Dicey, recoring intro and credits voiceovers, drawing the comics
  • Yoru - Moral Support, the most important job
  • TheEnderStar - dropping into the Discord call and throwing in some cooll sound effects for the snake and spider
